thread.title: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC
thread.title_full: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC

title: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC
text: > Top News Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo to star in 'Othello' in NYC FILE - In this Dec. 4, 2014, file photo actor Daniel Craig poses for photographers at the announcement for the new Bond film, the 24th in the series, at Pinewood Studios in west London. A couple of big-time movie stars will be appearing off-Broadway in fall 2016 when Craig and David Oyelowo appear in a production of William Shakespeare’s “Othello” at New York Theatre Workshop. Sam Gold, a Tony-winner for “Fun Home” will direct the tragedy, with “Selma” star Oyelowo playing the title role and super spy 007 Craig as Iago. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP, File)
